author: Rebekah Scanlan
title: Coronavirus: Mum claims family’s Sydney hotel quarantine ‘inhumane’
description: Coronavirus: Mum claims family’s Sydney hotel quarantine ‘inhumane’ news.com.au
content:
An Australian mum in quarantine with her partner and two children has branded the conditions at their Sydney hotel inhumane. Aimee Roberts flew back home to Australia on Sunday with her Irish husband and two boys, aged seven and two.
Upon arrival the family … [+5970 chars]
